question: Which of the following inscriptions provide a lot of details, regarding the village administration under the Cholas?
explanation: It is believed that he donated the village to Vedic Brahmins from Srivaishanva community. A tenth century inscription states the name of the village as \"Uttaramerur Chaturvedi Mangalam\". Around 25 inscriptions, spanning reigns of around four Pallava kings, have been found at Uthiramerur.
